title: Ultimate Smartphone Battery Life!
description: BLU Studio Energy 2 -  BLU Energy X -   FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
transcript: What's up guys Lew here, back with another video and today i am checking out two smart phones that are relatively inexpensive for what they are and they are also battery monsters they have huge batteries this one on the right is studio energy 2 has a 5000 mAh battery Five thousand! they are saying this can get you 3 days of battery life or 30 days of standby time, a month of standby. this one on the left The Energy X is a little bit smaller it features a 4000 mAh battery. it is still a monster. This guy on the left is just over a hundred bucks and the studio energy 2 with an amoled display is 179 bucks thats pretty crazy I dont know how BLU does it It is pretty amazing you can get your hands on these days for under 200 bucks or in this case, almost a 100 bucks. So Specs. Lets talk specs Energy X, 5'' IPS HDdisplay, energy 2 - 5 Inch Super Amoled 8Megapixel camera on the back and a 5 Megapixel camera on the front on the Energy Two. 2 mega Pixel front on the on the energy 2 2 mega pixel front on the energy x 1 g vs 1.5 expandable storage on the energy 2 and i was just talking to jack earlier about how interesting expandable storage just became to me a new use for extended storage which is youtube red you can download youtube videos and watch them later in the airplane and what not you can start to stock pile a lot of content and that can the day where android fans and apple fans came together like this us it as a tip and as always i will catch you in the next episode later guys
